New Records: The Oklahoma City Thunder won their 11th straight game.
Key Match Events: The matchup of Western Conference leaders turned lopsided before halftime.
Rookie Ajay Mitchell scored 17 points, Aaron Wiggins contributed 16 and Jalen Williams added 14 points and 10 rebounds.
Pre-Game Insights: There are no pre-game insights mentioned in the article.
Post-Match Reflections: The Oklahoma City Thunder opened a five-game lead over second-place Memphis.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Thunder (26-5) played against the short-handed Memphis Grizzlies.
Others: There are no other details mentioned in the article.
